meanings.definition: A support for the arm, especially on a chair or sofa.
meanings.sent1: The comfortable armrest on the sofa helped me relax after a long day.
meanings.sent2: I leaned my tired arm on the armrest of the chair while watching TV.
meanings.sent3: When the cat mistook the armrest for a scratching post, chaos ensued.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed in the room, bouncing off the armrests of the chairs.
meanings.sent5: The armrest, like a loyal friend, always provides a place to rest your arm.

meanings.sent1: The carpenter carefully armrested the new chairs for the waiting room.
meanings.sent2: She armrested the old rocking chair to make it more comfortable for her grandmother.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous toddler tried to armrest his toy car, thinking it needed a break.
meanings.sent4: The designer decided to armrest the entire row of seats in the theater for added comfort.
meanings.sent5: With a few simple tools, he armrested the wooden bench in his backyard for a cozy feel.
